channel.title: Delta Combat Lagg Fix
channel.description: Hey Mopar. I'm currently coding a Delta source and I would like to know how to fix the combat delay that the delta sources come with. I know this has been a big problem for deltas and I would like to know how to fix it. Any suggest will be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
